website_summaries.verdict: Fossil's signature D-ring and design goes with multiple looks, from business to evening wear.
pros: Leather covers the back of the watch, making it hypoallergenic
Dainty but with a face that's still easy to read
cons: Soft leather tends to darken and may look worn quickly

customer_reviews.title: Lovely watch, but replacement leather bands are hard to find...
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch and actually own two of them--the design is feminine and I like the simple, easy to read face. In general, leather watch bands tend to deteriorate after around a year and the watchband for the Georgia design is unique to it. The deterioration of a leather watchband should not render the watch obsolete! I believe that Fossil should offer replacement watch bands on its website for around $25. There is a clear code number on the back of the watch: ES3077. We should be able to enter it into the Fossil website dialogue box and buy the replacement!
customer_reviews.author: North Country Lover

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: in this picture, the little latches on the sides look sort of gaudy to me, but luckily I saw it in person first. -the latches are NOT gaudy - they are elegant, like the rest of the watch -it's genuine leather -very soft around your wrist -beautiful in silver
customer_reviews.author: Kate Kiddo

customer_reviews.title: Very thick case and very skinny band - returned :-(
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for the look of this watch in person. The case is shockingly thick - the specs say 10mm but unfortunately I didn't pay attention to that before ordering. The case is rather heavy and thick, while the band feels flimsy and is very skinny - seems out of proportion. I thought I would like the rose gold but it looked kind of cheap to me.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.

customer_reviews.title: Simple fix for easily scratched screen
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch!! It’s beautiful and goes well with my other silver jewelry! Someone had posted that the face scratches very easily and they were right I scratched mine on the first day I had it so I took a screen protector for a cell phone and cut it down to fit over the face of mine, you can’t even tell it’s there..well I can now but it’s about time to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: Zana Ann

customer_reviews.title: I've changed my review, unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say I've changed my initial favorable review to an unfavorable one. When I buy a Fossil watch I expect good quality that lasts. I paid extra for this watch because of the beautiful Rose Gold-Tone color. Unfortunately that color has now turned into a brassy metal color that looks cheap and not at all attractive. I have not had this watch for more than a few months which is another disappointment. Evidently me thinking I had bought a quality piece I could enjoy for years is no longer true with Fossil. Darn it! I liked this watch and got many compliments on it for the first couple of months I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Sundance

customer_reviews.title: Try to pretreat? Don't get wet AT ALL!
customer_reviews.text: The face of this watch is beautiful. Nothing takes away from that. However.... If you get the tan one, it comes in the most beautiful color. But let's be realistic, we walk in rain, we splash while brushing our teeth, inevitably this watch is gonna come into contact with water at some point and then the color turns cheap looking. It's very unfortunate. I wish it came pretreated or something along those lines. I am very good with my jewelry but life does happen and you shouldn't have to baby your day to day watch to this extent. It's a bummer because I love Fossil products and the face is gorgeous but now my watch just looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Melina Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Love this Watch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch in July 2012. It is now December 2013 and the watch is still beautiful. The leather has worn visibly which I don't mind the look of personally. The only problem is that the little leather ring that you put the end of the strap in to keep it from flopping around (am I being clear?) has gotten loose and slides around. If I ever buy a new watch, I'll probably just get the same one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: glassbottomboat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty watch, but the band will discolor quickly.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this watch was a great deal. It was shipped quickly. The Fossil content box was scratched up some, and the watch itself had a minor spot on the leather band, but it didn’t keep me from loving the watch. It is lightweight and classy looking. I’m okay paying less for minor imperfections. **Update: after wearing this watch for over a week, I’ve noticed the band has drastically changed in color. It looks dirty and some areas are blackening. Not sure I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I love fossil watches. This one is a feminine take on the mens style. Pros: Love the leather backing, watch face was perfect size for me (it wasn't tiny). Cons: the strap is VERY thin, and while it says it's for women, I am almost all the way on the first hole... I don't have small wrists... so this band is sized more like a mens size. Because the strap is so thin and the face is bigger it has a tendency to flip to the outside of my wrist, which annoys me but others might not mind.
customer_reviews.author: TMG_FL

customer_reviews.title: SEXY new "boyfriend" looks so good "hanging" on my arm...eye-candy
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my new "boyfriend" Fossil Watch! Received many compliments today...perfect birthday gift to myself! 2nd Fossil watch I have owned in 10 years...and not a thing wrong with the old one...just wanted a "boyfriend" style this time around. The only "drawback" with the older Fossil...would be replacing the battery...i had to take it to a special jewelry store that had some type of "contraption" to remove the back, replace the old battery, and then press it back together. COVID-19 drove that multi-generational jewelry tradesman into permanent retirement and locked the doors forever...so 😥. Hopefully, my new "boyfriend" won't require this special treatment, but if he does...it will be worth it...he is so sexy.
customer_reviews.author: Joy C.

customer_reviews.title: Watch that did not last long.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the "Georgia" Fossil watch in August of 2019. Within 5 months, the crystal cracked and the the watch band fastener came loose. I teach school so there wasn't any hard wear and tear on this watch. Any watch at a cost of over $50.00-$100.00 should last longer than that. Amazon suggested I contact the Fossil Company direct, which I did. Not only would they not replace the watch, but also estimated a $70.00 watch to repair it. This isn't good customer service, and I am very disappointed. I had a Fossil watch years and years ago and it lasted for many years. Problems with production and parts these days perhaps? I wouldn't recommend this watch as a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Randi L. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Love the band, Face too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the band on this watch which is why I chose it. The only problem is the actual watch is too heavy/large for the small band and it turns around. I have to have it extra tight to keep the face upright. Not the most comfortable. Always really like Fossil but this was kind of disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Just soapin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a casual but pretty watch. I was looking for a watch with a leather band. I like that the watch face is large but the band is narrow. The band has stretched a bit which is to be expected. After a month of wearing it I am securing it on the 4th hole. My wrist measures 6” in circumference. There are 7 holes left for larger wrists and 3 holes left for smaller wrists. Water resistant isn’t starred because I’m not sure if it is.
customer_reviews.author: lizzie2

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE Band! Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love my watch. I hate the band. I managed to get nine months out of it and now I may as well toss it in the trash. This band looks and feels great but both of the bands by the buckle have broken. I have looked into buying a new band but apparently there isn't one and this is a common issue. BOO!
customer_reviews.author: M. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch:0
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this watch actually fits the smallest thing on my person....my wrist. I love the look of a fully stainless watch, but they never fit my wrist..enough of the links cannot be taken out to make them fit. This watch has a large face...so I can actually see it, w/o having to squint too much, or do something totally kooky and break out reading glasses in which to see the time. The leather on this watch appears to be of high quality. The face is stainless. Buckle is sturdy. Great watch for $$$$. Thank you Amazon and Fossil :0
customer_reviews.author: Kayrun1

customer_reviews.title: Love my new watch
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new watch. I am a senior now and don't need a watch every day but when I am out and about would be nice to have a watch. also at many offices no clocks. I wanted a large face watch, wanted a natural band this is leather. I really love everything about this watch so far. I also really really love the color of it. very pleased-the time was set on it which I didn't expect although this is my first ever electronic watch. I love the tin it came in too so far very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Kathyinozarks

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! The color of the band is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! The color of the band is a dark taupe. The band is skinner than I expected but I like it because I can wear it with more casual outfits. The hands are also glow in the dark. Very happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pilow

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty style
customer_reviews.text: I like that there is leather between the watch and my wrist since my skin reacts to metal. One downside is that after wearing it for just a few days the face of the watch is already scratched. I've had another Fossil watch with the same problem. It seems to scratch easier than any other watches I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the face on this watch, it's super-easy to read. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the band, I don't think it will hold up, and may be very difficult to find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: codemargo

customer_reviews.title: No water resistance
customer_reviews.text: Take it off before wash your your hands ;( it is not water resisted. Wasted my money. Never buy a cheap product . I uploaded a picture. I had trusted you.
customer_reviews.author: esra

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Valentine's Day and she absolutely loves it, it is a very good quality piece as you would expect from fossil I own/use fossil brand watches myself and this one presents just as well as the mens line. The leather band is 8 millimeters which is a bit more narrow than I realized however my wife likes the size of it and the casing/face. The looks of the watch is suitable for All Occasions. I would highly recommend just know it's made out of leather you need to condition it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a lady!!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted it this watch for a long time and finally I found it on amazon!! Very happy and looking very good and it's very stylish!! Photo attached FYI!
customer_reviews.author: Raluca

customer_reviews.title: Great, beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is not only attractive, it is very comfortable. The leather band backing to the watch's metal case keeps my skin from the irritation I always experience with traditional watches. Plus, the size of the watch component is large enough so as to be easily read but light/small enough from hurting the bones of my wrist. I tried several cheaper watches (after my old Fossil watch band broke and had been discontinued) but none of them could compare. I should have spent the extra money right away instead of wasting time and money on inferior time pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, long lasting, great quality watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! It is my favorite watch, I’ve had it for a few years and have received complements for it. I’ve had it for years now and I wear it daily, the leather didn’t fade or crack or wear out. The gold didn’t fade or run off, it looks almost brand new even after all these years. After about 3-4years the battery has finally given out on it and I just haven’t gotten around to replacing it. I would 100% recommend this watch and would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Erick S.

customer_reviews.title: I love the band and watch itself
customer_reviews.text: I love the band and watch itself. The hands and numerals glow in the dark, which is a plus. It has a contemporary look, and the band color and size are unusual. The only negative--I thought the face would be smaller to go with such a narrow band. I wore it a day to see if I liked the bigger face and decided that I did. It is easy to see and read so I kept the watch. Overall, its a very good looking timepiece !
customer_reviews.author: E. Mac Texan

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, but....
customer_reviews.text: I really like the watch and it is functioning well. However, the specific wrist band this watch comes with is held on by small pins, and a regular watch band will not fit. I used a piece of floss to tie it all together and am disappointed to find out that the insurance I bought with the watch does not include the band.
customer_reviews.author: Margreet D. Fledderus

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a watch that had a different, more slim look than my others, but was still strong enough for daily wear. This one fits the bill perfectly. The band is narrow, but is thick and seems pretty strong. I love the chrome and brown leather combo, not too flashy, not too utilitarian. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tatooed Lady

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: I have this watch in stainless with tan wrist band. I really like it. Thought the rose gold/gray was a good combination of style and color. I’m a clock-watcher and watch collector. This one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: southern belle

customer_reviews.title: Lovely watch !!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful as are all Fossil watches. It is a gorgeous casual piece however, is not for everyday use as the leather band is very thin and will eventually stretch and wear out. It is definitely worth purchasing once as it will not be used daily.
customer_reviews.author: Meesh

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this just a few days and already am in love with it. It looks great on and is totally comfortable. It's nice enough (for me) to wear to work, but not too fancy or dressy for everyday wear, as well. The face is large compared to the thickness of the band, but I don't think it looks bad or weird. I really like it and am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily F.

customer_reviews.title: The watch is very nice and has a classy look
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very nice and has a classy look. I am having trouble with securing the wrist band past the small fixed loops where the watch band slips under. I had to get help to slip it through the first time as I couldn't slip it through. I now can but with difficulty. Fossil needs to make changes so the fixed loops are not so tight and are user friendly. I think with regular use the loops should loosen up but hopefully it won't t take months!
customer_reviews.author: M. Avila

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the Fossil watch for women
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the Fossil watch for women! It is a perfect size, and the clarity of the watch face makes seeing it so much better than other watches. I have had two Fossil watches for women, so I when I broke the metal band on my last Fossil watch, I couldn't wait to get it repaired. I had to have one, so I ordered this one from Amazon. I've always been a metal band type of lady, but I'm beginning to like the leather strap.
customer_reviews.author: Cathey 's

customer_reviews.title: Holds up over time
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. My wife had the original one for 2 years bought from fossil. It was worn often in many conditions and never showed signs of wear. Keeps perfect time. Ordered on Amazon this one as a direct replacement for the one my wife lost while in the hospital. She was so happy to get an identical one to the one she lost. Checked for Fossil Authenticity and it's a real one.
customer_reviews.author: Gotcha4More

customer_reviews.title: Stylish at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this pretty watch for me for my birthday. I have one other Fossil watch in another color and love it. I especially like the dark face, which makes it easier to read the time. I also like the leather strap which also goes underneath the watch itself. This feature would make it good for those who are sensitive to metal. The D ring hardware in rose gold is very trendy right now. It looks very stylish and the price was reasonable too. I would totally recommend it to any woman looking for these qualities in a watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sharla C.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and expensive looking. I wanted a brand name watch with a bright face that had a distinctive look. Would have given 5 stars if not for the thin band. It’s a nice band but would like a slightly wider band. Just received today so will see how it runs. Good price point
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do its most important job
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful watch but it has never kept good time. I had the battery replaced recently, but it still loses time each day. Not by small quantities either, usually it's 10 minutes slow by the end of the day. It's a pity because it's the only watch I've ever found that didn't bother my sensitive skin or overwhelm my tiny wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, good price.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is the perfect size, I wanted a big enough face that it is easy to see and goes along with the trend of larger faced watches. The band is delicate in size but sturdy leather with a casual look that goes with anything I wear. I have been wearing it a week so far, at work and home and it seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Style at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Fossil makes hundreds of styles, this one is awesome. The metal was nice, consistent, and without flaws. The leather work on the band was great. All edges even, thickness of leather consistent, metal used in band matches the watch case, and all the metal in the band connection area. Very good looking watch. Was a great gift, I was happy to give.
customer_reviews.author: james wittlake

customer_reviews.title: This is an outstandingwatch. It is versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding watch . It is versatile, and stylish without being too trendy. Unless you're wearing formal attire, it looks good with just about any style or type of clothing. Fossil is such a reliable brand which only adds to the attractiveness of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Anne Jones

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I wanted to get a more casual sporty watch, tired of the metal bracelet bands. This was a pleasant surprise. Thin delicate band looks a bit more brown than gray, and the brown face framed by rose gold is gorgeous! So comfortable I hardly know it's there!
customer_reviews.author: Pkingc

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch! But be aware of its actual color...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great! The size and fit are perfect. But the rose gold metal does look more like a copper color and that metal color against the gray leather makes the gray look very brown. I see see cooper and brown when I look at this watch. Nonetheless I do think its a great watch and I actually love that color combination. I also think it will look good with any mix of metals for any jewelry worn with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Band feels flimsy and cracking
customer_reviews.text: I actually do love the style and fit and I have small wrists and it still fits perfectly. However, the band seems so flimsy that I'm afraid to wear it too often and afraid it will break within a short period of time. The band is a little scratchy. Sadly going to have to return it; not wasting money on a watch from fossil I feel is going to break! :(
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and classic!
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can simply unlock the links to remove them to adjust the length if the band. It's lightweight and rests comfortably on the wrist. It's understated presentation is simply elegant and very sophisticated all the while being durable and suitable for those days you're sporting denim. Love the "D" rings that connect the timepiece to the band! Absolutely stunning piece!
customer_reviews.author: swillis

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Long term wear caused noticable discoloration on the band. Other than that a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Newbree

customer_reviews.title: Great Everyday Watch
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I got this watch. I've had it on my wishlist forever, and got it on a lightning deal. I love the Fossil brand, and this watch is so cute and wearable. The colors are great, and it matches a lot of what I wear.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Quite disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks great but the strap is of really bad quality. A few drops of water on the strap and its already become black-ish. Quite disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Anurag

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch. I had another one in a different color that lasted me years until it stopped ticking, and I recently replaced it with another. My new watch has been swimming with me in not only pools, but also the ocean. It keeps the time accurately, and it looks all kinds of classy. The price is hard to beat for such great quality. I highly recommend this watch if you're skeptical.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of my favorite watches. The watch band is leather in the back of the watch, which works great for me because I am allergic to some metals. Thinking of getting another watch by Fossil.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy  aka Uniboob

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with a Nickle Allergy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this watch. It looks professional and great for work. Lightweight and narrow band make it very comfortable. My favorite feature is the the band actually wraps over the battery and covers it with a soft leather. I have sensitivity for nickle and metal jewerly, which makes watches often uncomfortable and can lead to a rash after awhile. However, this strap provides a soft covering so I can wear it all day without any irritation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. Came in quick
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Came in quick. I liked it so much I bought one for my daughter and another in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Francis Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice for me.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good pick for someone with a small wrist. The strap is very stiff and the watch is large, it always falls to the inside of my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: pinky

customer_reviews.title: Sad Face
customer_reviews.text: Simple easy to read nice watch, as I purchased in tan. Although I was very disappointed, screw holding band and face of watch fell apart within hours. Again very, very disappointed, as I’ve always been a fan of Fossil watches. Returned item immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mel James

customer_reviews.title: Face of watch is heavy for the band.  BUT it is a handsome watch!
customer_reviews.text: Watch face is heavy for the band. I have to wear it on the last hole in the band to keep it from working its way to the back of my wrist--It still works around to the side. I do have a small wrist so maybe that is a factor. Regardless, It is a handsome (beautiful) watch and I love the Fossil brand.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Russell

customer_reviews.title: Part of the strap broke
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this watch. I've worn it just about every day for two years. Unfortunately, the two smaller loops that hold the excess strap down broke. The leather snapped at the main band. I wish that the watch lasted longer, because it really was a beautiful watch
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Luczywo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful watch, however, the leather band started looking worn down within the first week. It almost seems like the texture of the band causes the band to easily stain. I would recommend a darker colored leather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dirty band
customer_reviews.text: The band got dirty very quickly! Only wore the watch for special occasions but still managed to look grubby. I read the other reviews that said the same thing but I figured I would probably be able to keep it clean.. not the case
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Elegant look!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little watch. Exactly like I wanted. The only thing is band is a little long not sure how to shorten. But I can wear it as is. It really has a great look.
customer_reviews.author: Maili GMa

customer_reviews.title: A lovely watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the color combination of this watch. I was worried that the face might be too big for my slender wrist, but it's really not. My only reason for giving a less than perfect rating is for the watch strap. The leather is supple and smooth, but I had no idea the color on it would change so quickly. I don't know much about caring for leather, but I didn't expect it to darken so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Bruenjes

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! It's a larger watch face than I would normally wear but it looks great. I plan on this being my everyday watch, the leather is soft and overall the watch has a great look to it. If you have small wrists, as I do, might consider purchasing something else, the band is long. I have it a bit loose on the third to last hole.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Value for money. Very good everyday watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. Easy to read. I have a tiny wrist and still fits well on my wrist. I got it a sale price so total value for money. Would recommend as a everyday office wear watch
customer_reviews.author: Manjiree

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch, feminine but not sissy, lol. It's so pretty but the face is big enough to see it quickly and easily. I live that it has leather all around the band and under the metal watch part, my skin just seems irritated by metals. The band is thin and comfortable on my wrist to move around. Live this watch, I wear it to work as a nurse and dresses up easily if I wear it in the evenings
customer_reviews.author: Mamma Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely watch. Face is big and your can see it. I had to return due to the fact it was tooo big for my small wrist. But it's a very pretty watch.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda P.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and poorly made!
customer_reviews.text: These watches were NOT worth your time or money. Very poorly made and after awhile the straps broke. Highly do NOT recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rosier

customer_reviews.title: very nice looking... broke easily still waiting for new band....one month later
customer_reviews.text: Update: NO CUSTOMER SERVICE...very good looking watch. i like it for a work watch. lots of compliments. UPDATE: customer service non existent. Pin fell out of watch and they won’t send replacement Sent it back after a month still no watch
customer_reviews.author: Andrea411

customer_reviews.title: nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I can now see why some other reviewers mentioned not being able to get just the right fit. I took out one link but if I were to take out two, the watch would be too tight. So I now have a watch that slides all over my wrist like a bangle instead of a watch. Still debating on whether to keep it or not. Aside from that issue, it looks like a very nice watch. EDIT: I've figured out how to wear this on my arm without it sliding around, so I am keeping it. It's a really great looking watch!
customer_reviews.author: Manders78

customer_reviews.title: Medium face, small strap
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice watch. Not cheap looking. The face is medium. The strap is thin. The strap is a dark gray/brown color and dark. I think whatever color you wear is what color it would reflect more. It is attractive. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: i love this watch, great quality and very cute
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a year and it is still holding up. the band that holds the extra leather has broken but I just use a small rubber band to hold it down. it has held up against wear and I always get it wet (on accident). really good quality and super cute. the face is not too big or small so I have no problem reading it and it doesn't take up too much space on my wrist. I love this watch
customer_reviews.author: Nobscot

customer_reviews.title: sleek and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This is so much prettier than I expected! It has a very sleek-looking face and the leather band is thin and stylish. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Beth

customer_reviews.title: This watch is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this watch. I really needed a small elegant watch that had something between my skin and the metal backing to the watch itself. This watch has a leather peice on the band that widens to do exactly what I needed it to. I wear this every day!
customer_reviews.author: Erick Lange

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of jewelry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch a coupe months ago and it has easily become my favorite watch!! The dark gray/rose gold is a combination that just says class. This is definitely a casual watch and certainly not formal wear, but it's a great piece for business casual or a day on the town. The face is on the large side, and even with a larger wrist, the clasp is band is generous. Love this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy R

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It looks great and works well. I would like to get a replacement band but besides that it's a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I've now had this watch for about two years and two months. It's beautiful, but the band lasted all of six months at a go and it's hard to replace easily. And now, two months past the warranty, the minute hand has broken.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and practical
customer_reviews.text: This watch has a leather insert under the watch face. I have a lot of skin allergies and like that the metal doesn’t touch my skin. It is attractive and I am a big fan of Fossil!
customer_reviews.author: Rose M. Frick

customer_reviews.title: Attractive. Easy to read. Band is very comfotable.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is attractive, the face is easy to read, the leather band is soft and has enough holes to give a good variety of holes for different size wrists. The watch comes with a nice fossil box.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaGirl414

customer_reviews.title: Cute But Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this cute watch. Then it arrived. Not working. So now, I have to return it while Amazon holds my money hostage. I'll go to a brick and mortar store for my next watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mlb

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. I have worn it off and on for a couple of weeks. It is already scratched. I have had a fossil before and it lasted forever this one just doesn’t seem to be a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cydni Washington

customer_reviews.title: I like my new watch unfortunately it came running already so ...
customer_reviews.text: I like my new watch unfortunately it came running already so I’m naturally concerned about the battery life now. It is not as large faced as I thought it would be but big enough. I’m just hoping I don’t have to replace the battery in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Safirblu

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love the worn look of the leather it is perfect for a rough tomboy girly girl, the sliver compliments it so well
customer_reviews.author: Chantal Kellyman

customer_reviews.title: ... it just arrived today and I'm kind of in love with it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Fossil watch- it just arrived today and I'm kind of in love with it. It has such a unique look to it! The watch face is the perfect size and the thin band keeps it really feminine looking. I'm so excited to wear it and will probably be shopping for another Fossil for days when I switch to a black purse and shoes :)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: My wife wears this as her daily watch and has the champagne colored one, but the band is wearing out. The band alone is almost as much as the entire watch, hence I just bought her another watch.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S

customer_reviews.title: Color was off
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars only because from the picture, I expected a dark brown band. The band I received is very light brown. Almost cognac in color. Frustrating because I bought this because of the dark brown band color. Have not taken it in water yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Dreyfus

customer_reviews.title: Great Fossil Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Large, modern face. Quality leather band (it is very light sand in color when you get it-it WILL darken as you wear it!). To lessen wear and darkening of band simply use a leather protectant/conditioner people! Overall super happy with my purchase for this price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Atrractive rose gold tones and elegant low profile style.
customer_reviews.text: This watch replaced a similar Fossil watch I have been wearing daily for > 6 yrs. While looking for a replacement strap for the original watch, decided to buy a second one. I really like the rose gold colored rim and brown face. Subtle colors, attractive, easy to read even in low light situations. Casual style.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy  EV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect every day watch!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and stylish. Easy to read watch face and really soft leather band. Would definitely recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Clair S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought me this watch for Christmas and I’m OBSESSED! It’s so cute, and it’s comfy! I like that the leather strap is thinner than others I’ve worn because it feels less intrusive in my office job where I do a lot of typing and whatnot. Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M

customer_reviews.title: Love the rose gold look
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Fossil. I like the large dial and the strap goes against my skin, not the back of the watch, I have a Nickel Allergy
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Had few weeks now, havent had any trouble with scratching or anything breaking/not working. Have no idea on how waterproof it is as I naturally just keep my watches away from water. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hebbas

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality watch. It is exactly like it shows in the picture with a classic look for more dress up occasions but also the nude color is perfect with jeans and a more casual look. The leather band is beautiful and super easy to fasten. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Machado

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I like that is a casual look and that is about the watch per se. I do not like digital watches just plain old fashion watches with third hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Watch
customer_reviews.text: Overall great watch. The watch face itself is medium in size, so it doesn’t look too big/small on my small wrist. Haven’t had any problems with staining/discoloring of the band. The band does taper down to a smaller width. Hopefully it holds up to wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Good option for people who are sensitive to metal allergies
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very sensitive to metals, prone to break out in a rash. The band covers the entire back of the watch. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MNgal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, came in a very useful tin can from Fossil. Exactly as shown in picture, it was too big for me (as I already knew because I have small wrists), but it didn't matter because the links are removable and I took out 2 of the links and even though it's not a perfect fit, it fits good enough for me to be content with it). Arrived about a week after I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Gal OutTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: disappointed cheap looking watch and was damaged
customer_reviews.text: honestly thought the band was leather and the crystal was scratched. Will not advise to buy to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie N.

customer_reviews.title: Product Strap is damaged
customer_reviews.text: Usually all the fossil products would be awesome. I have bought more than 8 watches from Fossil, but with this AMAZON order, my strap has got damaged. Since I have took this as a birthday gift, I had very bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love it but can’t wear it
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this watch. I have always bought functional, stretch band watches. This watch is beautiful! BUT, a screw that holds the band on came out and I couldn’t find it. I’m heartbroken. Of course, too late to return. And I’m one of many trying to see how to get a replacement screw. If you buy this watch, be sure to check and tighten the screws frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Bechtold

customer_reviews.title: Really cute - however, I worry that Relic doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cute - however, I worry that Relic doesn't sell replacement bands for this specific watch model when the time comes to replace it. I know relic sells replacement bands for other styled watches.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Kaits

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on her and very inexpensive for a nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. Looks great on her and very inexpensive for a nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: Darin M

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the watch today, I am very pleased with the watch! Just as pictured. The only thing I'm disappointed about is the tin can it came in. It was bent all out if shape. Tried to bend back in placed bc its a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied purchase
customer_reviews.text: First glance i thought it was small, after i put it on totally different. I love it. It's perfect on me for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this. I have ridiculously small wrists too so I have to wear it on the last setting but still absolutely adore.
customer_reviews.author: KayLynn

product_meta.title: Fossil Women's Georgia Quartz Stainless Steel and Leather Casual Watch
product_meta.description:
Designed around Fossil's signature D-Ring shaped hardware, this bestselling collection brings rich materials and signature design to transform your wrist from simple to chic. We love the vintage-inspired details of this gray leather and rose gold-tone stainless steel watch. It's the perfect timepiece to wear day or night. This Georgia watch also features a three hand movement.

 * Item model number :ES2830
 * Department :Women
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :February 26, 2011
 * Manufacturer :Fossil
 * ASIN :B004NBZ5KM

We love the vintage-inspired details of this gray leather and rose gold-tone stainless steel watch. It's the perfect timepiece to wear day or night. This Georgia watch also features a three hand movement.

Round Stainless Steel case, with a Brown dial
5 ATM: Water resistant up to 50m: Wearable while swimming in shallow water
